definition: to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
Gujral (name)/Inder Kumar Gujral (1919-2012), Indian Janata politician, prime minister 1997-1998

sentences.english: Steven Gerrard today backed calls for the introduction of goal-line technology.
sentences.chinese: 杰拉德今天表示了他对引入球门线技术的支持。

sentences.english: Gerard tried the light on the nightstand, but it was out.
sentences.chinese: 杰拉德试图打开床头灯，但灯没亮。

sentences.english: President Gerald Ford presented her with the Medal of Freedom in nineteen seventy-seven.
sentences.chinese: 在1977年杰拉尔德福特总统颁发给她自由勋章。

sentences.english: It was past one by the time I got to Gerard’s.
sentences.chinese: 这是我去杰拉德家的一段往事。

sentences.english: Gerald helped his wife into the carriage and gave orders to the coachman to drive carefully.
sentences.chinese: 杰拉尔德把妻子扶进马车，叮嘱车夫小心驾驶。

sentences.english: Waitress Geraldine Showalter in Grand Isle.
sentences.chinese: 女服务员杰拉尔丁肖沃尔特在大岛。

sentences.english: Real Mallorca are close to announcing a deal for Chelsea attacker Sergio Tejera.
sentences.chinese: 马略卡即将宣布与切尔西进攻球员特杰拉德签约。

sentences.english: And Gerro insists the super-stylish Reds wil NEVER have a better chance to finish champions.
sentences.chinese: 杰拉德说现在是红军夺取冠军的最好时机。

sentences.english: The Reds got back to winning ways with second-half strikes from Gerrard and Yossi Benayoun.
sentences.chinese: 利物浦下半场由杰拉德和贝纳永的进球取得胜利。

sentences.english: Obviously the news that Stevie and Fernando were staying gave everyone another lift.
sentences.chinese: 杰拉德和托雷斯的留队很明显的鼓舞了我们。

sentences.english: Still there was no sign of Gerald on the quiet winding road.
sentences.chinese: 蜿蜒的大路上仍然没有杰拉尔德的影子。

sentences.english: Gerald is an executive at a big insurance company.
sentences.chinese: 杰拉尔德是一家大型保险公司的总经理。

sentences.english: Gerald was nettled by this implication of vulgar materialism.
sentences.chinese: 杰拉德被她话语中流露出的庸俗唯物主义惹恼了。

sentences.english: The centre-half was also made captain for the night at the request of Stevie G.
sentences.chinese: 那晚这位中卫在杰拉德的要求下戴上的队长袖标。

sentences.english: As soon as Stevie (Gerrard) opened the scoring, we never really looked like losing.
sentences.chinese: 杰拉德的进球帮我们打开了胜利之门。

sentences.english: Gerald wanted to be a planter.
sentences.chinese: 杰拉尔德要当一个地主。

definition: Safi (Moroccan city on the Atlantic coast)
Acre, city in Israel, also known as Akko
